info.title: About Me
info.description: I am passionate about programming and web development, I like to learn and improve my skills every day, I specialize in frontend technologies, however I am always willing to adapt to new languages, libraries and frameworks.
info.description2: I consider myself a responsible person, with initiative and commitment, I also like to work in a team, always willing to learn from others and share my knowledge.

0.title: Started studying Computer Engineer
0.description: I started my career as a computer engineer, where I developed skills in analysis, design, implementation and maintenance of software systems.

1.title: IT Technician
1.description: I got my first job as an IT technician, here I took care of the maintenance of the company's computers and networks.

2.title: Mobile Developer
2.description: I started to work as a freelancer, I developed my first professional mobile applications and I learned about backend technologies such as C#, ASP.NET Core, etc.

3.title: Web Developer
3.description: I started to work as a web developer in Musa, I got deeper into frontend technologies such as TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, Apollo Client, etc.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: I like to work in a team, I am always willing to learn from others and share my knowledge.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: I am a good communicator, I like to share my ideas and listen to others.

problem-solving.title: Problem Solving
problem-solving.description: I like to solve problems, I am always looking for the best solution.

goal-oriented.title: Goal Oriented
goal-oriented.description: I am a person who likes to set goals and achieve them.

adaptability.title: Adaptability
adaptability.description: I am always willing to adapt to new technologies, languages, libraries and frameworks.

time-management.title: Time Management
time-management.description: I am a person who likes to organize my time, I am always looking for the best way to do things.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: I am a creative person, I like to think outside the box and come up with new ideas.

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.description: I am a person who likes to lead, I like to take the initiative and be responsible for the tasks I am assigned.

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: I am a person who likes to organize, I like to have everything in order.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: I am a responsible person, I like to take care of the tasks I am assigned.

initiative.title: Initiative
initiative.description: I am a person who likes to take the initiative, I like to be proactive and always be looking for new challenges.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.description: I am a committed person, I like to finish the tasks I am assigned.
